Hi! I'm Zainab Alasadi — a UX designer with a background in computer science, currently scaling design systems at Macquarie Group.

I’ve previously interned at Oscar, led design at 180DC and studied at UNSW. Lover of , , , and . Avid supporter of the em dash and lifelong investor in . I spend my free time admiring pretty fonts, exploring the coasts of Sydney and stressing out over a missing semicolon.
